alertDescription.value: PureFA Chassis Hardware Temperature will parse the Hardware temperature log and extract index of the Chassis. Alarming when a sensor reports a temperature above 50C

query.value: InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_gauge('purefa_hardware_temperature_celsius') | extend Sensor = tostring(Labels.sensor) | extend Chassis = tostring(Labels.chassis) | extend Controller = tostring(Labels.controller) | where isempty(Controller)
